SummaryEnglish:
"There lies a city on the fault line between Heaven and Hell, Daten City, where humans live under the constant threat of attack from evil spirits. Darkness invades peoples' hearts, and not one person realizes that it is consuming the city... There are those who seek to obliterate these manifestations of human desire with transcendent light. Has the duty of repelling the darkness fallen to the messengers of God or the servants of Satan?" -- 

The story centres on a teen-celebrity-like sex-crazed blonde-haired girl named Panty and a her sugar-addicted black-haired Goth Loli sister Stocking. Kicked out of heaven for their misdeeds there, these two angels now have to battle Ghosts on Earth for Heaven Coin, to pay for tickets back to Heaven. -- 

"Do the angels bring tidings of hope and light? Or do they bring despair and darkness?" Better bet on the latter!
Aliases: NEW Panty And Stocking with Garterbelt

1.SummaryEnglish: A special short included with the 5th DVD/BD release.
Panty and Stocking are sent to investigate several cases of people getting eaten by toilets, which are caused by a ghost bent on covering Daten City in feces.

2.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking chase after a ghost with the ability to possess vehicles. However, Panty's underwear (which transform into her weapon) get stuck on the ghost's head, making it difficult to get them back without damaging them.

3.SummaryEnglish: While investigating a series of disappearances at Daten City High School, Panty and Stocking encounter Queen Barby, the cheerleading team captain whose reign as the most popular student is threatened by the Anarchy sisters. With the help of the teenage occult geek Brief, Panty and Stocking expose Barby as the Ghost behind the school's disappearances.

4.SummaryEnglish: At the preview of her and Stocking's first feature film, Panty screens a pornographic film she once starred in, which leaks to the public. With her celebrity lifestyle at risk, Panty travels the world with Stocking and destroys every copy of the porn in existence save for one, which the sisters decide to keep for themselves. But when Panty reveals she edited out all of Stocking's scenes in their film, Stocking gets revenge by uploading the last porn copy online.

5.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking get into a heated argument over a missing cup of pudding and go their separate ways. However, they are forced to put their differences aside to defeat a pair of Ghosts who work as a team.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Ghosts of vengeful sperm cause a shortage of tissue paper, rendering the men in Daten City incapable of wiping themselves after ejaculating.

7.SummaryEnglish: Stocking finds herself gaining weight and goes on an intense diet, but she only keeps getting fatter until she balloons into a giant. When the cause is revealed to be from an obese Ghost who refuses to diet, Stocking sets out for revenge. Upon defeating the Ghost, Stocking returns to her original figure.

8.SummaryEnglish: Daten City High School holds a lingerie run in which participants must race in their underwear. The run is interrupted by a Ghost who eats underwear, including Panty and Stocking's weapons, so Panty must resort to using whatever underwear she can find.

9.SummaryEnglish: A recreational nose-picking fad spreads across Daten City thanks to a man named Oscar H. Genius, who invites the citizens of Daten City to a blimp party. However, Genius turns out to be a Ghost intent on ramming the blimp into the moon using the passengers' collective nosebleeds.

10.SummaryEnglish: In the gloomy town of Little Tokyo neighboring Daten City, a struggling office worker named Terao is denied his chance to attend his young daughter's birthday party and forced by his co-workers to drink a mountain of beer, causing him to create a Ghost made of vomit. Panty and Stocking defeat the Ghost and decide to help Terao with his troubles by giving him their autographs as a present for his daughter, who is an avid fan of the Anarchy sisters.

11.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking arrive at school to find that a strict academic regime has been established by the mayor's daughters, the Demon sisters Scanty and Kneesocks, and are banished to the lowest class in school. Together with Brief, Panty and Stocking discover that Scanty and Kneesocks are demons who are running a factory that produces an army of fake Ghosts beneath the school. A destructive battle ensues, with the Anarchy sisters defeating the Daemon sisters by destroying the stone that powers the factory.

12.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking's sibling feud escalates into all-out war when they eat the cores of two warring alien robots and transform into robots themselves. When the alien robots decide to join forces to destroy the human race and merge into a Ghost, Panty and Stocking are once again forced to work together to defeat the Ghost.

13.SummaryEnglish: Garterbelt gets angry at Panty and Stocking for wasting money, so the sisters make a bet to raise $3 million in three days. Getting jobs proves difficult for them, so they resort to going to a casino run by Scanty and Kneesocks, who rig their games to ensure the angels will lose. The Anarchy sisters eventually run out of money, but by selling their clothes to onlookers, they manage to play long enough to break through the Demon sisters' scheme and earn their $3 million.

14.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking are holed up in a town where Scanty and Kneesocks have unleashed a horde of zombies that are immune to the Anarchy sisters' weapons, until they turn on the Demon sisters and turn the entire city into zombies.

15.SummaryEnglish: The disguised Demon sisters put Panty and Stocking on trial for the murder of a friendly Ghost, with a monkey wearing a translation device on its head serving as the sisters' defense attorney. The sisters are found guilty and sentenced to electrocution, which jolts the monkey lawyer's translation device and grants him heightened intelligence, allowing him to prove the sisters' innocence and implicate the murdered Ghost's wife as the true culprit.

16.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking once again face off against Scanty and Kneesocks, this time in a volleyball match to determine who will control the public beach. The Anarchy sisters win, but the Demon sisters unleash a horde of aquatic Ghosts to wreak havoc before making a getaway.

17.TitleEnglish: Ghost: The Phantom of Daten City
17.SummaryEnglish: Stocking falls in love with a repulsive and ill-mannered Ghost and is willing to forsake her duties as an angel in order to be with him. Concerned for her sister, Panty attempts to kill the Ghost, but the Ghost proves to reciprocate Stocking's feelings and proposes to her. The moment Stocking accepts, however, the Ghost finds himself at peace and ascends to Heaven.

18.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking are shrunken down and wind up inside Brief's body where they wreak havoc.

19.SummaryEnglish: The second part is a trilogy of shorts starring Panty and Stocking's pet sidekick, Chuck.

20.SummaryEnglish: The third part is a music video featuring the main characters performing "D City Rock feat. Debra Zeer".

21.TitleEnglish: Once Upon a Time in Garterbelt
21.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking suspect Garterbelt of engaging in sexual activities behind their backs and search for incriminating evidence to use against him. They instead find Garterbelt's diary, which details his past life as a crime lord before he was killed and forced by God to live through all of history until he agreed to become His missionary.

22.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking spend the entire day in their living room, discussing various things while waiting for Garterbelt to make them dinner.

23.SummaryEnglish: Scanty and Kneesocks report the results of their unsuccessful battles with Panty and Stocking, as well as the whereabouts of the blood kin of Hell's Monkey, to Corset, the mayor of Daten City.

24.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking have collected enough Heaven Coins to be allowed back into Heaven. However, only Stocking is taken back while Panty is forced to repeat her duties on Earth and forbidden to have sex as punishment for her immoral behavior. To cheer her up, Brief invites her to a party where he is to be engaged to the mayor's daughter (Scanty in disguise) and instead announces his intention to marry Panty. Scanty and Kneesocks attack Panty, who begins losing her angelic powers and escapes with Brief. Panty decides to have sex with Brief, but finds herself unable to do so as she has regained her virginity. Corset and the Demon sisters appear and kidnap Brief, the blood kin of Hell's Monkey whose penis is the key to Hell's Gate, leaving Panty powerless to save him.

25.SummaryEnglish: Having lost her powers, Panty is kicked out by Garterbelt and moves onto a farm with an old woman who, unbeknownst to her, is in league with Garterbelt and persuades her to stop Corset from using Brief to unlock Hell's Gate. Panty has sex with Brief, losing her virginity and restoring her powers. Stocking returns to help Panty fight Corset and the Demon sisters.

26.SummaryEnglish: Brief accidentally unlocks Hell's Gate with his penis, unleashing a massive Ghost that begins destroying Daten City. Corset kills Garterbelt and merges with the Ghost to invade Heaven. Panty and Stocking find Garterbelt's credit card and use it to buy countless weapons from Heaven and form a massive laser with which to defeat Corset. However, they accidentally fire it backwards into the sky, though it instead summons Panty and Stocking's mother, who destroys Corset and pushes the Ghost back into Hell's Gate, which is sealed. Garterbelt returns to life to continue watching over the Anarchy sisters, who are once again kicked out of Heaven for maxing out his credit card, thus using up their Heaven Coins. Following the end credits is a string of bizarre plot twists that set up a premise for another season and baffle all the characters present.

2.SummaryEnglish:
The Bitches Are Back!!

In Daten City, a realm between heaven and hell, sinister spirits known as "Ghosts" prowl the streets, feeding on human desires and resentment. Yet, in the darkest moments, two figures emerge to obliterate these vengeful beings with a divine light beyond human understanding. Their names? Panty & Stocking! These fallen angel sisters have been tasked with purging the darkness engulfing the earth. But who are they, really? Are they truly messengers of God... or agents of the Devil?

1.SummaryEnglish: Continuing from the cliffhanger in the previous season, Garterbelt, Brief and Chuck team up with Scanty and Kneesocks to resurrect Panty and stop an out-of-control Stocking.

2.SummaryEnglish: Garterbelt has Panty, Stocking, Scanty and Knee Socks search all over Daten City for a ghost made of water and oil.

3.SummaryEnglish: In order to pay off three trillion Daten City dollars worth of bills Panty competes in a card game in order to get a rare card that is worth the exact amount needed to pay the bills.

4.TitleEnglish: Project S: The Worst Ever Dojo
4.SummaryEnglish: After another argument with Panty, Stocking works together with Scanty to kill a Ghost at a dojo.

5.SummaryEnglish: Daten City is experiencing an unprecedented SNS boom! Stocking is engrossed in an app that lets you earn hearts and feel good. Before I knew it, Panty and the Demon Sisters have also gotten hooked on the app...

6.SummaryEnglish: On a certain afternoon, Panty was sleeping peacefully with a relaxed breathing sound. Under the bed, there was a crumpled ball of tissue paper...

7.SummaryEnglish: Stocking must win Daten City's presidential election in order to pardon Panty.

8.SummaryEnglish: Panty plans to kill a cat Ghost, but soon grows affection for it.

9.SummaryEnglish: The four girls, with the help of a strange man from space, try to kill a monolith before it destroys the universe.

10.SummaryEnglish: A sushi ghost causes a hurricane to strike Daten City while Scanty attempts to poop.

11.SummaryEnglish: Garterbelt takes pity on a Turtle Ghost, which later possesses his soul.

12.SummaryEnglish: A series of murders are happening in Daten City, the victims are blonde sexy promiscuous girls, on hands of a Murderer Ghost, and the next one in the spotlight is Panty.

13.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking get replaced by their cousins, the angel brothers Polyester and Polyurethane.

14.SummaryEnglish: Garterbelt, Briefs, and Chuck finally cry out in despair at the tyranny of the Angel Sisters and Devil Sisters. Garterbelt leaves the church and heads to Casino City with Briefs to fulfill her humble dream of spending a night at Casino City's strip bar! But...

15.SummaryEnglish: Both the Anarchy and Daemon Sisters are sent to prison and must win a game of American football for their freedom.

16.SummaryEnglish: Impact Cop attempts to discover the root of all evil.

17.SummaryEnglish: A grief-stricken Impact Cop vows to end evil once and for all.

18.SummaryEnglish: Panty is barred from swearing, causing her to find a loophole.

19.SummaryEnglish: Stocking is desperate to win an Ohagi Unicorn.

20.SummaryEnglish: Polyester and Polyurethane sneak into the church to find out what Panty and Stocking's weaknesses are.

21.SummaryEnglish: Kneesocks celebrates her birthday without her sister.

22.SummaryEnglish: Garterbelt tries to save the world from a mysterious and lustful alien.

23.TitleEnglish: Lord of the Kokan the Great
23.SummaryEnglish: Long before the dawn of civilization, a warrior whose homeland has been burned sets out on a journey of revenge.

24.SummaryEnglish: Brief falls into a deep hole and tries to escape with the help of Chuck.

25.TitleEnglish: Panty Shorts and the Penis of Doom
25.SummaryEnglish: Following Garterbelt's orders, Panty and her friends head to the ruins where a legendary treasure lies.

26.SummaryEnglish: When Honekoneko gets destroyed in the wash, Stocking tries fixing him only for a time-traveler to interrupt her.

27.SummaryEnglish: Kneesocks is forced to take Santa Claus' job on Christmas.

28.TitleEnglish: Heaven Wars Episode One - The Family Menace
28.SummaryEnglish: Panty and Stocking are invited back into Heaven by their parents.

29.TitleEnglish: Heaven Wars Episode Two - Attack of the Uncle
29.SummaryEnglish: Ramie prepares to use a mighty weapon to take over Hell and Earth.

30.TitleEnglish: Heaven Wars Episode Three - Revenge of the Bitch
30.SummaryEnglish: The Bitches stand up to the new king of gods! The final battle that will decides the fate of Heaven, Earth and Hell begins…
